name: ChatGPT / GPT-4o
summary: A leading multimodal conversational AI assistant for text, code, image, and voice interactions, offering advanced reasoning and file analysis capabilities.

name: Claude 3 / 3.5
summary: An enterprise-grade conversational AI, known for its strong performance in complex reasoning, long context windows, and focus on safety and constitutional AI.

name: Google Gemini
summary: Google's family of multimodal AI models and a conversational assistant deeply integrated with the Google ecosystem (Workspace, Search).

name: Perplexity AI
summary: An AI-powered search engine that provides direct answers and summaries, citing its sources for enhanced reliability and research value.

name: Microsoft Copilot
summary: An AI assistant integrated across Microsoft 365, Windows, and Bing, enhancing productivity for coding, document creation, and digital workflows.

name: GitHub Copilot
summary: An AI pair programmer that provides code suggestions and completions in real-time, directly within major IDEs.

name: Cursor
summary: An AI-powered code editor built on VS Code that excels at codebase-aware chat, code generation, and debugging for complex projects.

name: Midjourney
summary: A leading proprietary AI image generator known for producing highly aesthetic, artistic, and photorealistic imagery from text prompts via Discord.

name: DALL-E 3
summary: An advanced image generation model integrated into ChatGPT and Copilot, specializing in generating accurate, instruction-following visuals.

name: Stable Diffusion
summary: A popular open-source image generation model that allows for extensive customization, fine-tuning, and local execution for high-control visual creation.

name: Runway Gen-2
summary: A leading AI tool for generating high-quality video clips from text, images, or existing video, offering cinematic controls and editing features.

name: Pika
summary: A popular AI platform focused on generating and editing video clips, allowing users to quickly animate static images and modify existing videos via text prompts.

name: ElevenLabs
summary: A state-of-the-art AI platform for realistic voice synthesis, offering text-to-speech, voice cloning, and dubbing in multiple languages for content creators.

name: Suno
summary: An AI music generator that creates full, original songs with vocals and instrumentation from simple text descriptions or lyrics.

name: Notion AI
summary: An AI assistant built into the all-in-one workspace, used for summarizing notes, drafting content, brainstorming, and automating tasks directly in documents.

name: GrammarlyGo
summary: An AI writing partner that goes beyond grammar correction to offer full generative text, tone adjustments, and response drafting across various applications.

name: Adobe Firefly
summary: A family of generative AI models integrated into Adobe Creative Cloud products for text-to-image, text effects, and generative fill/expand in design workflows.

name: Canva Magic Studio
summary: An integrated suite of AI design tools for image generation, text editing, and automated presentation creation within the user-friendly design platform.

name: Zapier AI Agents
summary: AI agents that automate complex, multi-step workflows by connecting thousands of apps and performing tasks based on natural language instructions.

name: Make (formerly Integromat)
summary: A visual platform for building, managing, and automating custom workflows and data transfers between applications, leveraging AI for task logic.

name: You.com
summary: A generative AI search engine that offers summarized results, chat, and an integrated 'Write' mode for text generation and content creation.

name: Jasper
summary: A generative AI platform primarily for marketing and business teams, focused on creating long-form content, campaign copy, and brand-consistent assets.

name: ChatGPT Advanced Data Analysis
summary: A feature within ChatGPT (formerly Code Interpreter) that allows users to upload, analyze, clean, and visualize data using natural language prompts.

name: Llama 3
summary: Meta's powerful, open-source large language model available in multiple sizes, used by developers for a wide range of text and code generation applications.

name: Synthesia
summary: A platform for creating professional-quality videos using AI avatars and text-to-speech, without needing cameras, studios, or actors.

name: Cohere Command
summary: A family of large language models optimized for enterprise use, focusing on superior long-context tasks, RAG, and multi-lingual processing via API.
